Documentation.UserDocu: This object allows to compute the modulation according to the publication of Dominik et al 2013 (The method of separation for evolutionary spectral density estimation of multi-variate and multi-dimensional non-stationary stochastic processes)
computeModulationA(nonZeroUpperBound) this function compute the modulation function according to Equation 28 nonZeroUpperBound = the value after which the moduluation value becomes zero

computeModulationB(nonZeroUpperBound) this function compute the modulation function according to Equation 29 time = the time value for which the modulation function is computed nonZeroUpperBound = the value after which the moduluation value becomes zero
